author: sky.cactus
content: Please don't just still your Twitter account in here.  Lots of people here write Twitter threads about things, but there is no need to link to them in this server.  If you want to discuss a topic you can start a conversation in here, but linking out to Twitter should only happen if it is relevant to a discussion that is already happening.

author: blink02446
content: Hey apologies no offense intended, thought this was something relevant to this particular channel that people may be interested in

author: sky.cactus
content: We have had a number of people in this server who don't engage and just link out to their twitter.  My recommendation is to *start* by engaging here and then link out to a relevant Twitter thread only if it comes up organically in the conversation.

author: blink02446
content: fair point, will take note for the future

author: sky.cactus
content: Almost none of the regulars in this server (people who engage frequently) post links to their own Twitter, and the only people who post out to their own tweets are newcomers or lurkers, which implies that it is just people trying to shill and build follower counts.

author: terence0083
content: Does bloXroute not simulate payload before releasing it to the proposer?

author: eyalbloxroute
content: Since our relays didn't support external builders, we didn't do double simulation and rely on our builders as they are running by us. We are now adding also simulation on the relay based on this issue

author: ruteri
content: Are you simulating all blocks now or just ones from external submissions or experimental builders?

author: eyalbloxroute
content: After we deploy the version today we will simulate all blocks including from our production relays. We will communicate when this deployment is completed
